note: Totally blind since birth in 1956 due to premature retinopathy. Interested in assistive technology for the blind, travel, meeting people and classic pop and TV shows of the 50’s 60’s and 70’s. A huge Montreal Canadiens fan and former fan of the Montreal Expos (defunked). Love meeting people, not necessarily with a disability but I consider myself to be an advocate for the blind and others.
